subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The Rangers, who were No. 3 in the N.H.L. in goals against in the regular season, regained their defensive form and reclaimed the series lead with a Game 3 victory.
snippet: The Rangers, who were No. 3 in the N.H.L. in goals against in the regular season, regained their defensive form and reclaimed the series lead with a Game 3 victory.
